post.body:
Add new virtual currency ( Bitcoin ) as a reward. Promote the development of ZeroNet.

Add new virtual currency ( Bitcoin ) as a reward mechanism. A virtual currency with a total amount of almost unlimited ipv6 can be generated based on the user, the newly created peer/site, the visited peer/site, the traffic, the connection duration, content rating, and so on. In order to prevent the rubbish content from stealing in the self-built network, it is also convenient for world-class communication, the rating content should be limited to the text language and evaluated by the machine natural language judgment algorithm.
